Question 52 
(MSQ)
 
 
 
Electromagnetic Theory
A
 
waveguide consists of two infinite parallel plates (perfect conductors) at a separation of 
4
10

cm, with 
air as the dielectric. Assume the speed of light in air to be 
8
3 10

m/s. The frequency/frequencies of TM 
waves which can propagate in this waveguide is/are
(A) 
12
0.5 10 Hz

 
(B) 
15
6 10 Hz

(C) 
14
8 10 Hz

 
(D) 
13
1 10 Hz

 
 
A, B, C, D 
Sol.
 
For parallel plate wave guide 
 
It passes all of the frequency components. 
 
Hence, the correct options are (A), (B), (C) and (D).
Note : 
All options of this Questions are correct, but IIT Kharagpur provides MTA for this Question.
